mapper.select: SELECT ipo_index, stock_name, stock_code, dart_code, stock_exchange, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_forecast_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_forecast_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_start_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_end_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_refund_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_refund_date, DATE_FORMAT(ipo_debut_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ipo_debut_date, lock_up_percent, ipo_institutional_acceptance_rate, ipo_price, ipo_price_low, ipo_price_high, number_of_ipo_shares, number_of_individual_ipo_shares, max_individual_ipo_shares, underwriter, put_back_option_who, put_back_option_price, put_back_option_deadline, tag FROM ipo
